articles.title: Asiana Airlines: Passenger arrested for opening plane door during South Korea flight - BBC
articles.description: The Asiana Airlines plane landed safely in South Korea after a passenger forced open an emergency door.
articles.content:
Media caption, Watch: Inside cabin as plane door opened mid-flight
A man has been arrested for opening a door of an Asiana Airlines flight as it was landing in South Korea.
All 194 passengers survi… [+1634 chars]
